TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SystemWebCachingSectionGroup extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup
Public NotInheritable Class SystemWebCachingSectionGroup Inherits ConfigurationSectionGroup

summary.span: 設定組態檔中的 群組。

span.span: Configures the group within a configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別 (Class) 提供以程式的方法，存取和修改組態檔的 `caching` 區段。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `caching` section of a configuration file. 類別和`caching`區段提供集中的控制的網站或應用程式的快取機制。The class and the `caching` section provide centralized control of the caching mechanism for a site or application. 這項功能可讓快取來部署、 修改和停用，而不需修改應用程式中的個別頁面。This makes it possible for caching to be deployed, modified, and disabled without modifying individual pages in the application. ASP.NET 快取機制藉由類別。The ASP.NET caching mechanism is implemented by the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 快取概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5ec28012-4972-4dc3-b3e8-9d20401fe11d)For more information, see [ASP.NET Caching Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5ec28012-4972-4dc3-b3e8-9d20401fe11d) 下列清單將描述兩種類型的快取 ASP.NET 提供。The following list describes the two types of caching ASP.NET provides. - 第一個部分稱為輸出快取，可讓您儲存動態網頁和使用者控制項的回應。The first is called output caching, which allows you to store dynamic page and user control responses. 在後續的要求，不會執行的網頁或使用者控制項程式碼;快取的輸出用來滿足要求。On subsequent requests, the page or user control code is not executed; the cached output is used to satisfy the request. 您可以存取使用的輸出快取設定和屬性。You can access output caching settings using the and properties. - 快取的第二種是傳統的應用程式資料快取，可用來以程式設計方式儲存伺服器記憶體的任意物件，因此您的應用程式可以節省時間和重新建立它們所需的資源。The second type of caching is traditional application data caching, which you can use to programmatically store arbitrary objects to server memory so your application can save the time and resources it takes to recreate them. 您可以使用這些快取設定屬性。You can access these cache settings using the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得從現有的 Web 應用程式相關聯的組態檔的物件。The following code example shows how to obtain the object from the configuration file associated with an existing Web application. 您可以使用此物件來存取包含在`caching`群組。You can use this object to access the sections contained in the `caching` group. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup/CS/SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup/VB/SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.vb#1)]

summary.span: 建立 的新執行個體。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式不是直接從您的程式碼使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它會呼叫 ASP.NET 組態系統。It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system. 取得的執行個體類別使用方法。You obtain an instance of the class by using the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Cache As CacheSection
public: property System::Web::Configuration::CacheSection ^ Cache { System::Web::Configuration::CacheSection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得組態內所含的 區段。

span.span: Gets the section contained within the configuration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會參考組態檔的 `cache` 區段。The object refers to the `cache` section of the configuration file. 您可以使用類別，以修改`cache`區段以程式設計的方式。You can use the class to modify the `cache` section programmatically. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得從現有的 Web 應用程式的組態檔的物件。The following code example shows how to obtain the object from the configuration file of an existing Web application. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup/CS/SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup/VB/SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會參考組態檔的 `outputCache` 區段。The object refers to the `outputCache` section of the configuration file. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得從現有的 Web 應用程式的組態檔的物件。The following code example shows how to obtain the object from the configuration file of an existing Web application. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup/CS/SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup/VB/SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OutputCacheSettings As OutputCacheSettingsSection

summary.span: 取得組態內所含的 區段。

span.span: Gets the section contained within the configuration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會參考組態檔的 `outputCacheSettings` 區段。The object refers to the `outputCacheSettings` section of the configuration file. 輸出快取設定會啟用或停用磁碟持續的輸出快取、 定義的位置將資料保存到快取，並指定每個應用程式快取的大小上限的資料。The output cache settings enable or disable disk-based persistent output cache, define the location for persisting the data to be cached, and specify the maximum size of the cache per application. ASP.NET 可讓您以宣告方式快取的頁面回應的多個版本，使用指示詞的屬性，並使用屬性和方法，以程式設計方式類別。ASP.NET allows you to cache multiple versions of a page response declaratively by using attributes of the directive and programmatically using the properties and methods of the class. 您可以設定應用程式使用，以達到相同的結果或型別。You can achieve the same results by configuring the application using the or the type. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得從現有的 Web 應用程式的組態檔的物件。The following code example shows how to obtain the object from the configuration file of an existing Web application. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup/CS/SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup/VB/SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SqlCacheDependency As SqlCacheDependencySection

summary.span: 取得組態內所含的 區段。

span.span: Gets the section contained within the configuration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會參考組態檔的 `sqlCacheDependency` 區段。The object refers to the `sqlCacheDependency` section of the configuration file. SQL 快取相依性會建立 ASP.NET 應用程式的快取和特定的 SQL Server 資料庫資料表中儲存的項目之間的關聯性。The SQL cache dependency establishes a relationship between an item stored in an ASP.NET application's cache and a specific SQL Server database table. 執行個體類別必須監視資料表，以便當資料表變更時將從快取自動移除項目。An instance of the class must monitor the table so that when the table changes the item will be automatically removed from the cache. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得從現有的 Web 應用程式的組態檔的物件。The following code example shows how to obtain the object from the configuration file of an existing Web application. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup/CS/SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup/VB/SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.vb#5)]
